result.execSummary:
The defendant Kevin J Kroener was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Child Enticement-Sexual Contact, a class D felony, Wisconsin Statutes 948.07(1).
  • Sexual Assault of Child by Person Who Works or Volunteers with Children, a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 948.095(3)(a).
  • Sex with Child Age 16 or Older, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 948.09.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

superMiscConds.notes: NO CONTACT WITH THE VICTIM OR HER FAMILY.  NO CONTACT WITH FEMALES UNDER THE AGE OF 18 UNLESS SUPERVISED. MAY HAVE CONTACT WITH OWN CHIDREN.  NO EMPLOYMENT WITH FEMALES UNDER THE AGE OF 18.
PROVIDE DNA.  REGISTER AS SEX OFFENDER.
SEX OFFENDER TREATMENT WITH FOLLOW UP.

charges.descr: Sexual Assault of Child by Person Who Works or Volunteers with Children
Sex with Child Age 16 or Older
